Package client

Class ClientListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • client.ClientListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class ClientListener
extends Thread
    The networking component of the client-side. This runs on a separate thread and manages sending and receiving data from the server, as well as connecting.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientListener

        public ClientListener​(int p,
                      FXMLLoader loader)
        Used when starting the client as a server.
        Parameters:
        p - Port to start the client listener with.
        loader - The FXMLLoader used to access the mainController

      • ClientListener

        public ClientListener​(String h,
                      int p,
                      FXMLLoader loader)
        Used when starting the client as a client, connecting to a remote host.
        Parameters:
        h - Host to connect to, often localhost.
        p - Used to pass a specific port. Usually the default, 45665.
        loader - The FXMLLoader used to access the mainController

    • Method Detail

      • getOut

        public static DataOutputStream getOut()
        A getter for the DataOutputStream.
        Returns:
        Returns a static DataOutputStream instance.

      • AttemptConnection

        private Socket AttemptConnection​(String host,
                                 int portNumber)
                          throws IOException
        A method used to attempt a connection to a host. Will block until connection is made.
        Parameters:
        host - The host used to connect to.
        portNumber - The port to connect via.
        Returns:
        Returns a socket to be used when fixing the input and output streams.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if there is an issue opening the socket.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class Thread

      • sendScreenUpdate

        public static void sendScreenUpdate​(DataOutputStream out,
                                    mainController mc)
                             throws IOException
        A helper method for sending screen updates to other clients. Calls the mainController to pull a byte[] of the graphicsContext and then writes it to the given DataOutputStream, prefixed by a single int value which identifies the length of the message (it is assumed the graphics context won't output the same length packet each time).
        Parameters:
        out - Takes a DataOutputStream to send the screen update through.
        mc - Takes a mainController instance to get the snapshot from.
        Throws:
        IOException - Can throw IOException since it is writing to a stream.

      • receiveScreenUpdate

        private void receiveScreenUpdate​(DataInputStream in)
                          throws IOException
        A helper method for receiving updates from other clients. First reads the packet length and then if that is greater than zero, it will use the message to write to call the method to update the graphicsContext.
        Parameters:
        in - Takes a DataInputStream to pull the packet from.
        Throws:
        IOException - Might throw an IOException because it is pulling from a DataInputStream.
